name: Escape From Castle Robostein
description:
Help Sally Sparks recover the ultimate AI and escape from Veronica VonRobostein's evil lair! 

Turn off your anti-virus self-scan before running, Clickteam Fusion games seem to false positive and then are deleted by a lot of anti-virus software. Sorry! I swear it's not a virus!

As of now it doesn't have a save system, so you have to do it all in one sitting! I may go back and add one in later.
